summary: A structured container that aggregates all outputs produced by a GroupViT model, including optional contrastive loss, image‑text similarity scores, pixel‑wise segmentation logits, projected text and image embeddings, and the raw outputs of the underlying text and vision sub‑models.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications—such as cross‑modal retrieval, semantic segmentation, and feature extraction—to conveniently retrieve the necessary tensors and model states from a single, well‑defined object.
